1126339313929572352.text:
Here's an Android ProTip for y'all.

Android only lets a site ask for notification permission once. To get past this and nag you until you give in, many sites have a fake consent popup. If you say no that means "keep asking". If you say yes, THEN they use the system consent (1/2)
